17 class OCR:

19  def __init__(self):
20 
21  self.bridge = CvBridge()
22  self.image_sub = rospy.Subscriber("/usb_cam/image_raw",Image,self.callback)
23  self.state_sub = rospy.Subscriber("controller_state",Int8,self.stateCallback)
24 
25  model_dir = '/root/catkin_ws/src/ocr/model/knn_trained_model.xml'
26  self.model = cv2.ml.KNearest_create()
27  self.model = cv2.ml.KNearest_load(model_dir)
28 
29  self.result_cnt = []
30  self.max_param = 3
31  self.result_max = -1
32  self.pre_vol = -1

35  self.str_predicted_val_1 = ""

40 
41  self.pub = rospy.Publisher('volume', Int8, queue_size=1)
42  self.ctr_cmd_sub = rospy.Subscriber("command", Int16MultiArray, self.ctrCmdCallback)
43

45  self.semantic_image_pub = rospy.Publisher("semantic_image",Image, queue_size=1)

53  print(self.goal_vol)

60  def callback(self,data):
61  self.result = [-1, -1, -1]
62 
63 
64 
65 
66  try:
67  cv_image = self.convert_to_cv_image(data)
68  if(cv_image is None):
69  raise Exception("cv_image has no image.")
70  self.image_pub.publish(self.bridge.cv2_to_imgmsg(cv_image, "bgr8"))
71  #cv2.imshow("cv_image", cv_image)
72 
73  except CvBridgeError as e:
74  print(e)
75 
76  try:
77  height, width, channel = cv_image.shape
78  matrix = cv2.getRotationMatrix2D((width/2, height/2), 0, 1)
79  dst = cv2.warpAffine(cv_image, matrix, (width, height))
80 
81  roi = self.get_roi(cv_image)
82  h, w, c = roi.shape
83  #print(h, w)
84 
85  #print(np.sum(roi[0:h, 0:w]))
86  #cv2.imshow('roi', roi)
87  cv2.waitKey(10)
88  if(np.sum(roi[0:h, 0:w]) != 0):
89  semantic_image = roi.copy()
90  black_img = np.zeros([semantic_image.shape[0],200,3],dtype=np.uint8)
91  semantic_image = np.concatenate((semantic_image, black_img), axis=1)
92 
93  roi_1, roi_2, roi_3, pts_each = self.get_each_roi(roi)
94  #cv2.imshow("roi_1", roi_1)
95  #cv2.imshow("roi_2", roi_2)
96  #cv2.imshow("roi_3", roi_3)
97 
98  vol = 0
99  semantic_image, vol_array = self.detect_volume(roi_1, roi_2, roi_3, semantic_image, pts_each)
100  print(vol_array)
101 
102  #print(str_rt_vol)
103 
104  if(vol_array[0] == -1):
105  self.str_rt_vol = "X"
106  else:
107  self.str_rt_vol = str(vol_array[0])
108 
109  if(vol_array[1] == -1):
110  self.str_rt_vol = self.str_rt_vol + "X"
111  else:
112  self.str_rt_vol = self.str_rt_vol + str(vol_array[1])
113 
114  if(vol_array[2] == -1):
115  self.str_rt_vol = self.str_rt_vol + "X"
116  else:
117  self.str_rt_vol = self.str_rt_vol + str(vol_array[2])
118 
119 
120  if((vol_array[0] != -1) and (vol_array[1] != -1) and (vol_array[2] != -1)):
121  vol = vol_array[0]*100 + vol_array[1]*10 + vol_array[2]
122  else:
123  vol = None
124  #print(vol_array)
125  if(vol != None):
126 
127  tracked_vol = self.track_volume(vol)
128  #print(tracked_vol)
129 
130  if(tracked_vol != None):
131  # reset
132  if(abs(tracked_vol - vol) > 3):
133  self.result_cnt = []
134  self.init_vol_flag = False
135  self.pre_vol_array = [-1, -1, -1]
136 
137  #self.str_valid_vol = str_result
138  self.str_valid_vol = str(self.pre_vol).zfill(3)
139  self.str_predicted_val_1 = str(tracked_vol-1).zfill(3)
140  self.str_predicted_val_2 = str(tracked_vol).zfill(3)
141  self.str_predicted_val_3 = str(tracked_vol+1).zfill(3)
142 
143  self.pub.publish(tracked_vol)
144 
145  #cv2.waitKey(3)
146  # Input Semantic Info
147  str_valid_val = "valid value: " + self.str_valid_vol
148  str_rt_val = "real-time value: " + self.str_rt_vol
149  str_predicted_val = "predicted value: "
150  str_target_val = "target value: " + str(self.goal_vol)
151  str_state = ""
152  if(self.state == 1):
153  str_state = "MOVE UP"
154  elif(self.state == 2):
155  str_state = "MOVE DOWN"
156  elif(self.state == 3):
157  str_state = "STOP"
158 
159  str_state_full = "state: " + str_state
160 
161  cv2.putText(semantic_image,str_valid_val,(130, 20),0,0.5,(255,255,255),1)
162  cv2.putText(semantic_image,str_rt_val,(130, 70),0,0.5,(255,255,255),1)
163  cv2.putText(semantic_image,str_predicted_val,(130, 120),0,0.5,(255,255,255),1)
164  cv2.putText(semantic_image,self.str_predicted_val_1,(265, 140),0,0.5,(255,255,255),1)
165  cv2.putText(semantic_image,self.str_predicted_val_2,(265, 160),0,0.5,(255,255,255),1)
166  cv2.putText(semantic_image,self.str_predicted_val_3,(265, 180),0,0.5,(255,255,255),1)
167  cv2.putText(semantic_image,str_target_val,(130, 210),0,0.5,(255,255,255),1)
168  cv2.putText(semantic_image,str_state_full,(130, 260),0,0.5,(255,255,255),1)
169 
170  # publish semantic image message
171  self.semantic_image_pub.publish(self.bridge.cv2_to_imgmsg(semantic_image, "bgr8"))
172

178 
179  def convert_to_cv_image(self, data):
180  """!
181  @brief when image callback function get the ros image message, convert it to cv_image(for opencv format)
182  @details
183 
184  @param[in] bridge: bridge which can convert ros image message to cv_image
185  @note input constraints:
186  @n - none
187 
188  @param[in] data: ros image message
189  @note output constraints:
190  @n - cv_image should not be empty
191  @n - cv_image should be sized 640 x 480
192  @n - cv_image should be color image (3 channel)
193 
194  @return cv_image converted to opencv format image
195  """
196  try:
197  cv_image = self.bridge.imgmsg_to_cv2(data, "bgr8")
198  if cv_image is None:
199  raise Exception('cv_image has no image.')
200 
201  h, w, c = cv_image.shape
202  if((h != 480) or (w != 640)):
203  string = "size of cv_image is not 640x480. the size of cv_image is " + str(w) + "x" + str(h) + "."
204  raise Exception(string)
205 
206  if (c != 3):
207  string = "channel of cv_image is not 3(rgb color image). the channel of cv_image is " + str(c) + "."
208  raise Exception(string)
209 
210  cv_image = cv2.flip(cv_image,-1)
211  return cv_image
212  except Exception as e:
213  print('error is occured.', e)
214  return None
215 
216  def is_contour_bad(self, c):
217  # approximate the contour
218  if cv2.contourArea(c)>10:
219  [x,y,w,h] = cv2.boundingRect(c)
220  if h>20 and h<40 and w<40:
221  return False
222 
223  # the contour is 'bad' if it is not digit
224  return True
225 
226  def get_roi(self, img):
227 
228  marked_img = img.copy()
229  h, w, c = img.shape
230  result = np.zeros((w,h,1), dtype="uint8")
231 
232  draft_roi_img = img[0:int(h*(3/4)), int(w*(3/9)):int(w*(5/8)-20)]
233  cv2.imshow("draft_roi_img", draft_roi_img)
234 
235  hsv = cv2.cvtColor(draft_roi_img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2HSV)
236  h_img, s_img, v_img = cv2.split(hsv)
237  #cv2.imshow("h", h_img)
238  #cv2.imshow("s", s_img)
239  #cv2.imshow("v", v_img)
240 
241  marked_img = h_img.copy()
242 
243  ret, rng = cv2.threshold(h_img, 80, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
244  cv2.imshow("rng",rng)
245 
246  # inrange for red number and black number
247  #rng = cv2.inRange(img, (100, 100, 100), (255, 255, 255))
248  #cv2.imshow("rng",rng)
249 
250  # Removing noise
251  # https://pyimagesearch.com/2015/02/09/removing-contours-image-using-python-opencv/
252 
253  cnts = cv2.findContours(rng,cv2.RETR_EXTERNAL,cv2.CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)
254  cnts = imutils.grab_contours(cnts)
255  mask = np.ones(rng.shape[:2], dtype="uint8") * 255
256 
257  # loop over the contours
258  for c in cnts:
259  # if the contour is bad, draw it on the mask
260  if self.is_contour_bad(c):
261  cv2.drawContours(mask, [c], -1, 0, -1)
262 
263  # remove the contours from the image and show the resulting images
264  rng = cv2.bitwise_and(rng, rng, mask=mask)
265  #cv2.imshow("Mask", mask)
266  #cv2.imshow("After", rng)
267 
268 
269  # find 4 contours
270  pts_cnt = 0
271  pts = np.zeros((4, 2), dtype=np.float32)
272 
273  cnts, hierarchy = cv2.findContours(rng,cv2.RETR_EXTERNAL,cv2.CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)
274 
275  if(len(cnts) == 4):
276  for i in cnts:
277  M = cv2.moments(i)
278  cX = int(M['m10'] / M['m00'])
279  cY = int(M['m01'] / M['m00'])
280 
281  cv2.circle(marked_img, (cX, cY), 3, (255, 0, 0), -1)
282  cv2.drawContours(marked_img, [i], 0, (0, 0, 255), 2)
283 
284  pts[pts_cnt] = [cX, cY]
285  pts_cnt += 1
286 
287  cv2.imshow("marked_img", marked_img)
288 
289  # perspective transform
290  # https://minimin2.tistory.com/135
291  #print(len(cnts))
292  #if(len(cnts) == 4) :
293  sm = pts.sum(axis=1)
294  #print(sm)
295  diff = np.diff(pts, axis=1)
296 
297  topLeft = pts[np.argmin(sm)] # x+y가 가장 값이 좌상단 좌표
298  bottomRight = pts[np.argmax(sm)] # x+y가 가장 큰 값이 우하단 좌표
299  topRight = pts[np.argmin(diff)] # x-y가 가장 작은 것이 우상단 좌표
300  bottomLeft = pts[np.argmax(diff)] # x-y가 가장 큰 값이 좌하단 좌표
301 
302  # 변환 전 4개 좌표
303  pts1 = np.float32([topLeft, topRight, bottomRight, bottomLeft])
304 
305  # 변환 후 영상에 사용할 서류의 폭과 높이 계산
306  w1 = abs(bottomRight[0] - bottomLeft[0])
307  w2 = abs(topRight[0] - topLeft[0])
308  h1 = abs(topRight[1] - bottomRight[1])
309  h2 = abs(topLeft[1] - bottomLeft[1])
310  width = max([w1, w2]) # 두 좌우 거리간의 최대값이 서류의 폭
311  height = max([h1, h2]) # 두 상하 거리간의 최대값이 서류의 높이
312 
313  # 변환 후 4개 좌표
314  pts2 = np.float32([[0, 0], [width - 1, 0],
315  [width - 1, height - 1], [0, height - 1]])
316 
317  # 변환 행렬 계산
318  mtrx = cv2.getPerspectiveTransform(pts1, pts2)
319 
320  # 원근 변환 적용
321  result = cv2.warpPerspective(draft_roi_img, mtrx, (width, height))
322  #cv2.imshow('scanned', result)
323 
324  return result
325 
326  def get_each_roi(self, roi):
327  pts_each = [[],[],[]]
328 
329  x=40; y=65; w=40; h=40
330  roi_1 = roi[y:y+h, x:x+w]
331 
332  pts_each[0].append(x)
333  pts_each[0].append(y)
334 
335  x=40; y=125; w=40; h=40
336  roi_2 = roi[y:y+h, x:x+w]
337 
338  pts_each[1].append(x)
339  pts_each[1].append(y)
340 
341  x=40; y=185; w=40; h=31
342  roi_3 = roi[y:y+h, x:x+w]
343 
344  pts_each[2].append(x)
345  pts_each[2].append(y)
346 
347  return roi_1, roi_2, roi_3, pts_each
348 
349  def detect_volume(self, roi_1, roi_2, roi_3, semantic_image, pts_each):
350  error_flag = False
351  vol_array = [-1, -1, -1]
352 
353  if((self.pre_vol_array[0] == -1) and (self.pre_vol_array[1] == -1) and (self.pre_vol_array[2] == -1)):
354  result, semantic_image = self.detect_each_volume(roi_1, 's', 50, semantic_image, pts_each[0])
355  if(result == -1):
356  error_flag = True
357  else:
358  # check num_1
359  # it should be 0 or 1 only
360  if(result != 1):
361  result = 0
362  vol_array[0] = result
363 
364  result, semantic_image = self.detect_each_volume(roi_2, 'v', 90, semantic_image, pts_each[1])
365  #print(result)
366  if(result == -1):
367  error_flag = True
368  else:
369  vol_array[1] = result
370 
371  result, semantic_image = self.detect_each_volume(roi_3, 'v', 90, semantic_image, pts_each[2])
372  #print(result)
373  if(result == -1):
374  error_flag = True
375  else:
376  vol_array[2] = result
377 
378  if(vol_array[1] != 0 or vol_array[2] != 0):
379  vol_array[0] = 0
380 
381 
382 
383  else:
384  result, semantic_image = self.detect_each_volume(roi_1, 's', 50, semantic_image, pts_each[0])
385  if(result == -1):
386  if(self.pre_vol_array[0] != -1):
387  result = self.pre_vol_array[0]
388  #print(self.pre_vol_array[0])
389  vol_array[0] = result
390  error_flag = True
391  else:
392  # check num_1
393  # it should be 0 or 1 only
394  if(self.pre_vol_array[1] != 9):
395  result = 0
396  if(result != 1):
397  result = 0
398 
399  vol_array[0] = result
400 
401  result, semantic_image = self.detect_each_volume(roi_2, 'v', 90, semantic_image, pts_each[1])
402  if(result == -1):
403  error_flag = True
404  else:
405  # check num_2
406  # it should be +1 or -1 from previous value
407  if(self.pre_vol_array[1] == 9):
408  if(result != 0 and result != 9 and result != 8):
409  result = -1
410  error_flag = True
411  elif(self.pre_vol_array[1] ==0):
412  if(result != 1 and result != 0 and result != 9):
413  result = -1
414  error_flag = True
415  else:
416  if((result < self.pre_vol_array[1]-1) or (result > self.pre_vol_array[1]+1)):
417  result = -1
418  error_flag = True
419  vol_array[1] = result
420 
421 
422  result, semantic_image = self.detect_each_volume(roi_3, 'v', 90, semantic_image, pts_each[2])
423  #print(result)
424  if(result == -1):
425  error_flag = True
426  else:
427  # check num_3
428  # it should be +1 or -1 from previous value
429  if(self.pre_vol_array[2] == 9):
430  if(self.state == 1):
431  if(result != 0 and result != 9):
432  result = -1
433  error_flag = True
434  elif(self.state == 2):
435  if(result != 9 and result != 8):
436  result = -1
437  error_flag = True
438  elif(self.pre_vol_array[2] ==0):
439  if(self.state == 1):
440  if(result != 1 and result != 0):
441  result = -1
442  error_flag = True
443  if(self.state == 2):
444  if(result != 0 and result != 9):
445  result = -1
446  error_flag = True
447  else:
448  if(self.state == 1):
449  if(result < self.pre_vol_array[2]):
450  result = -1
451  error_flag = True
452  if(self.state == 2):
453  if(result > self.pre_vol_array[2]):
454  result = -1
455  error_flag = True
456  vol_array[2] = result
457 
458 
459  if(error_flag):
460  return semantic_image, vol_array
461  else:
462  self.pre_vol_array[0] = int(vol_array[0])
463  self.pre_vol_array[1] = int(vol_array[1])
464  self.pre_vol_array[2] = int(vol_array[2])
465  #print(self.pre_vol_array)
466  return semantic_image, vol_array
467 
468  def detect_each_volume(self, roi, format, thresh_value, semantic_image, pt_each):
469  result_val = None
470  roi_h, roi_w, roi_c = roi.shape
471 
472  hsv = cv2.cvtColor(roi, cv2.COLOR_BGR2HSV)
473  h, s, v = cv2.split(hsv)
474 
475  hsv_img = None
476  bin_img = None
477  if(format == 'h'):
478  hsv_img = h.copy()
479  #cv2.imshow("h", h)
480  elif(format == 's'):
481  hsv_img = s.copy()
482  #cv2.imshow("s", s)
483  (thresh, bin_img) = cv2.threshold(hsv_img, thresh_value, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY)
484  #cv2.imshow("bin", bin_img)
485  elif(format == 'v'):
486  hsv_img = v.copy()
487  #cv2.imshow("v", v)
488  (thresh, bin_img) = cv2.threshold(hsv_img, thresh_value, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
489  #cv2.imshow("bin", bin_img)
490 
491  #(thresh, bin_img) = cv2.threshold(hsv_img, thresh_value, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
492 
493  #cv2.waitKey(100)
494 
495  contours,hierarchy = cv2.findContours(bin_img,cv2.RETR_EXTERNAL,cv2.CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)
496  out = np.zeros(roi.shape,np.uint8)
497  draw_flag = False
498  #print(len(contours))
499  for cnt in contours:
500  if cv2.contourArea(cnt)>20:
501  [x,y,w,h] = cv2.boundingRect(cnt)
502  if h>20:
503  # compare with center point
504  M = cv2.moments(cnt, False)
505  cx = int(M['m10'] / M['m00'])
506  cy = int(M['m01'] / M['m00'])
507 
508  in_center = self.judge_center(cx, cy, roi_w, roi_h)
509  #print(cx)
510  #print(in_center)
511 
512  if(in_center == False):
513  return -1, semantic_image
514 
515  cv2.rectangle(roi,(x,y),(x+w,y+h),(0,255,0),2)
516  # semantic image drawing
517  #print(pts)
518  if(draw_flag == False):
519  cv2.rectangle(semantic_image,(int(pt_each[0])+x,int(pt_each[1])+y),(int(pt_each[0])+x+w,int(pt_each[1])+y+h),(0,255,0),2)
520  draw_flag = True
521  roi_bin = bin_img[y:y+h,x:x+w]
522  #cv2.imshow('roi_bin',roi_bin)
523  roismall = cv2.resize(roi_bin,(10,10))
524  #cv2.imshow('roismall',roismall)
525  roismall = roismall.reshape((1,100))
526  roismall = np.float32(roismall)
527 
528  retval, results, neigh_resp, dists = self.model.findNearest(roismall, k = 3)
529  string = str(int((results[0][0])))
530  #print(string)
531  #cv2.putText(out,string,(x,y+h),0,1,(255,255,255))
532 
533  result_val = int((results[0][0]))
534  #cv2.imshow("roi",roi)
535  #cv2.waitKey(3)
536 
537  if(result_val == None):
538  return -1, semantic_image
539  else:
540  return result_val, semantic_image
541 
542  def judge_center(self, cx, cy, w, h):
543  if((cx > w/4) and (cx < w*(3/4))):
544  return True
545  else:
546  return False
547 
548  def track_volume(self, vol):
549  if (len(self.result_cnt) < self.max_param) and (self.init_vol_flag == False):
550  self.result_cnt.append(vol)
551  else :
552  if(self.init_vol_flag == False):
553  #self.result_cnt.pop(0)
554  #self.result_cnt.append(vol)
555  self.result_max = max(self.result_cnt)
556  #print(self.result_max)
557  self.pre_vol = self.result_max
558 
559  self.init_vol_flag = True
560 
561  if(self.init_vol_flag == True):
562  if((vol == self.pre_vol) or (vol == self.pre_vol-1) or (vol == self.pre_vol+1)):
563  self.pre_vol = vol
564  #print(self.pre_vol)
565  return vol
